title: How to get book donations for personal use - Quora

response.answer_text: Great question and we’ve got the answer as well. Visit the website of MyPustak and you will find the solution to your problems. MyPustak is a great initiative that receives books from amazing people and enlist them on their website. but before enlisting them, the books are checked and inspected so they reach the buyers in a great condition. And what more, the books are all free of cost. All you’ve to pay for are the handling and delivery charges and the books will reach at your doorstep in a matter of days. You will find a wide variety of books for like competitive exams like UPSC, IAS, JEE, and medical. Books for schools and for leisurely reading. You can find anything and everything here.
A local thrift shop - Goodwill, etc. Local library book sales. Look at yard sales, church jumble sales. Habitat for Humanity Restores.

According to your query, you should refer Mypustak. This site has got all genres of books especially competitive books for IIT-JEE, NEET, NCERT books for children, fiction, non-fiction books, etc. These donated books are found in good condition whereas the shipping charges on orders are free. You can avail books from here at cheap affordable prices and sometimes even free of cost!
